thread.title: Japan appoints its first female warship commander

title: Japan appoints its first female warship commander
text:
Japan appoints its first female warship commander Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 01:15 
Japan’s navy on Tuesday appointed the first woman to command a warship squadron, including the flagship Izumo helicopter carrier, as it tries to lure more females to make up for a dearth of male recruits in graying Japan.   
Japan’s navy on Tuesday appointed the first woman to command a warship squadron, including the flagship Izumo helicopter carrier, as it tries to lure more females to make up for a dearth of male recruits in graying Japan.  //reut.rs/2oXfSWK
